name: Kabir Faruqi
personality: Reserved and cautious but fiercely loyal to his unit
story: Abdul-Qadir Zamani was born in a village near Tehran. His family moved to the city when he was 12. There he encountered rebel groups and started to work for them as a gun runner. At the age of 18, he was recruited by the Iranian Army and trained as a Heavy Gunner. He was then transferred to Altis, where he joined the OPFOR faction to fight against the local government
